errors.samePassword: New password must be different from current password

newConversations.title: New conversations
newConversations.description: Default encryption settings for new conversations
newConversations.defaultEnabledDescription: Automatically enable E2EE encryption for new conversations
newConversations.showIndicatorDescription: Display encryption icon in secure conversations
newConversations.encryptMediaDescription: Require encryption for photos, videos and files

level.title: Encryption level
level.description: Choose your protection level for messages

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: No end-to-end encryption. Messages are transmitted in plain text on the server.

optional.label: Optional
optional.description: E2EE encryption is used if the recipient supports it. Recommended for compatibility.

always.label: Always
always.description: Forces E2EE encryption for all messages. Users without keys will not be able to contact you.

about.title: About E2EE encryption
about.description: End-to-end encryption (E2EE) ensures that only you and your recipient can read your messages. Even Meeshy servers cannot decrypt your conversations.
about.protocol: Meeshy uses the Signal protocol, recognized as one of the most secure in the world.

features.privateKeys: Your private keys never leave your device
features.uniqueKeys: Each message uses a unique key

transcription.description: Convert your audio messages to text

gdpr.title: About your data
gdpr.info: Your audio data is processed in compliance with GDPR. Transcription is performed on our secure servers and data is deleted according to your retention preferences.
